name: Generate Stop Connection Graph
description: Create a graph on bus stops and connections between them. Converts connections in the road network to a single edge.

params.name: Left-side drive
params.help: Specifies that road users should on the left. If omitted, it is assumed road users drive on the right.

params.name: Max search distance
params.help: Specifies the maximum distance to search for neighboring stops, in meters. Defaults to 1000.

inputStageFormats.name: Stops
inputStageFormats.help: The stops between which to make the stop connection graph edges

outputStageFormats.name: Stop connection graph
outputStageFormats.help: A json file containing the generated stops
